text_en: A computer which is well facilitated with Jaws program is needed.
That program aids you to get to know what you have written by voice.
A sighted person can check if it is possible to read it using a screen.
Jaws is not only for knowing what you have written, but in case if you want to read a document.
It is that program that assist you how to get it or how to read it for yourself without consulting any other person to come and help me.
